      • find

        public ReportPublication find(java.lang.Integer id)
                       throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve the report in the database associated to a unique ID
        Parameters:
        id: - the unique ID of the required report
        Returns:
        the report associated to the given unique ID
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.NoResultException - if the search didn't return any result

      • getAllReportPublications

        public java.util.List<ReportPublication> getAllReportPublications()

        the list of all the report publications in the database
